short_description: children's hospital pyjamas is a psychologists & counseling services provider based in croydon, united kingdom.
long_description: we are a uk-based charity (registration number 1185739), which collects donations of brand new pyjamas, from the public, which we then donate to hospitals, hospices and women's refuges across the uk. children's hospital pyjamas started in november 2010 when the founder's daughter was an in-patient in the hospital. get in touch today to find out more and get involved. every year we take your donations and provide them to hundreds of wards, units and women's refuges including alder hey hospital, birmingham children's hospital, chelsea and westminster hospital, great ormond street hospital, king's college hospital, my shining star children's cancer charity , ronald mcdonald houses, royal marsden hospital and shooting star children's hospice.

generated_description: children's hospital pyjamas is a uk-based charity based in croydon, england. the organization collects donations of brand new pyjamas from the public and distributes them to hospitals, hospices, school hospital teams, and women's refuges across the country. these pyjamas are provided to children who are inpatients, aiming to offer comfort and support during their hospital stays. the charity was founded in november 2010, following the experience of the founder's daughter as an inpatient.
